dict.acceptation: 可能，可能性；希望，可能发生的事物；

sent.orig: Even if advised of the possibility of such damages or if such possibility was reasonably foreseeable.
sent.trans: 即使被告知该损害的可能性或可合理预见该可能性。

sent.orig: Accept the possibility, for without that possibility there can be no success.
sent.trans: 接受这个可能，因为没有这种可能就不会有成功。

sent.orig: To prepare for such possibility possibility, a government laboratory laboratory is collecting seeds ash trees.
sent.trans: 为了应对这种可能性，一个政府实验室正在收集白蜡树的种子。

sent.orig: Possibility of engine malfunctions due to moisture, are lessened.
sent.trans: 发动机故障的可能性，由于水分，也将减少。

sent.orig: The possibility of designing optical filters using photonic crystals technique was studied in this paper.
sent.trans: 对光子晶体技术在滤光片设计中的应用进行了可行性研究。
